alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Fernando Valley; Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Malibu Coast; Palos Verdes Hills; Santa Susana Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range; Western San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 03 at 3:13PM PDT until April 04 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
